text: @realDonaldTrump Sources tell CNN WH is moving further to limit Coronavirus task force members from testifying at hearings.  At the moment, Fauci is still scheduled to testify before GOP-led Senate cmte next week. That plan hasn't changed. But task force members have been told about new policy.
